name: Fruit Tales
description:
Fruit Tale is a match 3 game that is released on PC, iOS, Google Play, and web.

The goal is to match 3 or more fruits by switching locations. Complete the unique goal of the level to go to the next level.

You can use 4 powerups to help you complete the more difficult levels. But beware these cost coins. You can earn coins by spinning the prize wheel.
